mobs.LongDesc: A lean man tends a camp fire here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a lean sunbrowned man with long graying brown hair hung to his waist
and gathered at the back of his neck with a cord. A thick brown beard lays
across his chest like a carpet.  His eyes glow bright yellow, like a piece of
gold in the sunlight.  As you near him, you see a wolf cuts you off.  Its
obvious that this man has some power over the wolfs of the forest.
